body:
<!-- **Are you in the right place?**
1. For issues or feature requests, please create an issue in this repository.
2. For general technical and non-technical questions, we are happy to help you on our [Rook.io Slack](https://slack.rook.io/).
3. Did you already search the existing open issues for anything similar? -->

**Is this a bug report or feature request?**
* Bug Report

**Deviation from expected behavior:**
As of rook 1.4, I can't get rgw spawed for an external cluster and operator keep throwing:
```
ceph-object-controller: failed to reconcile invalid object store "object" arguments: ceph cluster is external but externalRgwEndpoints list is empty
```
mds are spawned normaly inside cluster

**Expected behavior:**
On rook 1.3, even with external cluster, rgw could get spawned inside kubernetes


**How to reproduce it (minimal and precise):**
<!-- Please let us know any circumstances for reproduction of your bug. -->

**File(s) to submit**:

* Cluster CR (custom resource), typically called `cluster.yaml`, if necessary
* Operator's logs, if necessary
* Crashing pod(s) logs, if necessary

 To get logs, use `kubectl -n <namespace> logs <pod name>`
When pasting logs, always surround them with backticks or use the `insert code` button from the Github UI.
Read [Github documentation if you need help](https://help.github.com/en/articles/creating-and-highlighting-code-blocks).

**Environment**:
* OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release): archlinux
* Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`): 5.8.7
* Cloud provider or hardware configuration:
* Rook version (use `rook version` inside of a Rook Pod): 1.4.2
* Storage backend version (e.g. for ceph do `ceph -v`): 14.2.8
* Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`): 1.19.0
* Kubernetes cluster type (e.g. Tectonic, GKE, OpenShift): custom
* Storage backend status (e.g. for Ceph use `ceph health` in the [Rook Ceph toolbox](https://rook.io/docs/rook/master/ceph-toolbox.html)):
```
  cluster:
    id:     245bbd68-4ebd-4da5-885b-acd5f8af0b8c
    health: HEALTH_OK
 
  services:
    mon: 5 daemons, quorum pepin,prune,pomme,peche,poire (age 12h)
    mgr: pepin(active, since 12h), standbys: prune, pomme, peche, poire
    mds: arch-cloud:1 {0=arch-cloud-b=up:active} 1 up:standby-replay
    osd: 5 osds: 5 up (since 12h), 5 in (since 12h)
 
  data:
    pools:   3 pools, 96 pgs
    objects: 22 objects, 2.2 KiB
    usage:   5.0 GiB used, 4.4 TiB / 4.4 TiB avail
    pgs:     96 active+clean
 
  io:
    client:   1.2 KiB/s rd, 2 op/s rd, 0 op/s wr
```
title: ceph cluster is external but externalRgwEndpoints list is empty
